    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3

    Facet GuaranteesAccepted_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3:GuaranteesAccepted_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<GuaranteesAccepted addressReqInd="true" bookingSourceAllowedInd="true" corpDiscountNbrAllowedInd="true" interbankNbrReqInd="true" nameReqInd="true" noCardHolderInfoReqInd="true" phoneReqInd="true" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3">
    <Type>Air travel card</Type>
    <PaymentCardCode>VI</PaymentCardCode>
</GuaranteesAccepted>

      Example JSON

      {
  "GuaranteesAccepted" : {
    "noCardHolderInfoReqInd" : true,
    "nameReqInd" : true,
    "addressReqInd" : true,
    "phoneReqInd" : true,
    "interbankNbrReqInd" : true,
    "bookingSourceAllowedInd" : true,
    "corpDiscountNbrAllowedInd" : true,
    "Type" : [ {
      "value" : "Air travel card"
    }, {
      "value" : "Air travel card"
    } ],
    "PaymentCardCode" : [ {
      "value" : "VI"
    }, {
      "value" : "VI"
    } ]
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Type
        Describes the forms of guarantee that are acceptable.
        Details
        Type PaymentType_Enum
        Example Value Air travel card
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 50
        PaymentCardCode
        Describes the acceptable forms of payment cards.
        Details
        Type PaymentCardCode_Enum
        Example Value VI
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 30

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        noCardHolderInfoReqInd
        If true, no credit card holder information is required. If false, it is not required.
        nameReqInd
        If true, the credit card holder name is required. If false, it is not required.
        addressReqInd
        If true, credit card holder address is required. If false, it is not required.
        phoneReqInd
        If true, credit card holder phone number is required. If false, it is not required.
        interbankNbrReqInd
        If true, the credit card interbank number is required. If false, it is not required.
        bookingSourceAllowedInd
        When true, the booking source may be used to guarantee the booking.
        corpDiscountNbrAllowedInd
        When true, the corporate discount number may be used to guarantee the booking.
